channel.title: People need some help please
channel.description:
hey people i need some help. the problem is there was a button called "info" and when i clicked it the info of the weapon came up but it had coins at the bottom of it and i wanted it to be tokens so i removed the whole info bit but is there anyway i could make it so that when ever somebody clicks info a message will come up and say how much it is please somebody respond ill screen it to show you if you don't understand me
it was like this: http://scr.hu/0kmz/jgys5
it's now like this: http://scr.hu/0kmz/5qxn5
so if you know how i could put the prices on there somehow please tell me thanks!

item.title: People need some help please
item.dc:creator: @yourbad yourbad
item.description:
@yourbad wrote:

yh, i removed info from interfaces but i need like sendmessage"whip is 100 pk token" when ever somebody clicks info

Read full topic
